title: CryptoATM
author: CryptoATM
content: When is a good time to start buying altcoins? Is bitcoin ever going to 25,000$ in the coming weeks? How do you plan to start building your portfolio for the next bull market? Is now a good time to start buying?.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: Now and when crypto will be always going down. Buy at the dip and sell at the pump. This is how it works today but bearish sentiment is still remain strong right now. It's still remain a prediction for bitcoin to go to the 25k. So many people have been calling this rate at the end of last month but it's still remain side way around 29k - 30k. buying any major coins with very big potential may give guarantee if that will give profit for the next years from now. I have planned to accumulate more during the bearish trend. I do belive market will not bearish forever.

comments.author: Botnake
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on June 07, 2022, 01:00:41 PMWhen is a good time to start buying altcoins? Is bitcoin ever going to 25,000$ in the coming weeks? How do you plan to start building your portfolio for the next bull market? Is now a good time to start buying?.You can start buying now, we are officially in the bear market, and prices are cheap so you could accumulate as many coins you like to addd to your portfolio. Bitcoin going down, that's possible mate, but the current price is already cheap, and it's also possible that the current price is already thw lowest, who knows, we might not see below $30k again once the market recovers.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Botnake on June 07, 2022, 03:22:09 PMQuote from: CryptoATM on June 07, 2022, 01:00:41 PMWhen is a good time to start buying altcoins? Is bitcoin ever going to 25,000$ in the coming weeks? How do you plan to start building your portfolio for the next bull market? Is now a good time to start buying?.You can start buying now, we are officially in the bear market, and prices are cheap so you could accumulate as many coins you like to addd to your portfolio. Bitcoin going down, that's possible mate, but the current price is already cheap, and it's also possible that the current price is already thw lowest, who knows, we might not see below $30k again once the market recovers. I think we are not at the bottom of a bear market, I would wait a little longer with a new entry into the majority of altcoins. they have weaker resistance than Bitcoin and I believe they will go even lower. Should also be very careful (based on experience from the previous bear) many very promising altcoins have never recovered.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on June 07, 2022, 01:00:41 PMWhen is a good time to start buying altcoins? Is bitcoin ever going to 25,000$ in the coming weeks? How do you plan to start building your portfolio for the next bull market? Is now a good time to start buying?.With altcoins you never know what to expect, personally i do not think Bitcoin is prolly going below 25k, not that it matters too much if it does, because if it actually goes below that amount then you have the opportunity to accumulate Bitcoin at a cheaper price than normal. To answer your question, i am only building my portfolio with Bitcoins for now, i do not really trust altcoins as long term projects, and i am a long term investor, thus Bitcoin is the most suitable project for me right now. If you want to speculate with altcoins you must be very careful, a lot could go wrong very quickly. No matter what you do, do not hodl altcoins for the long period, sell them in the short term and take the profit you can get, altcoins are short term projects and most of them are not sustainable for the long period.

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: For me anytime is a good time to buy but this bear time I think is the perfect time to buy altcoins. At the moment my eyes are locked in Ethereum and BNB only and I am sure that there ATH is not the highest they will achieve it though in reality we are really not sure when is the right time, so every lower lows or pullbacks, I always buy ETH and BNB.

comments.author: Reid
comments.body: I am done building it and it's the same as last year. I don't have the money anymore to buy a new crypto so I think that means I had enough. Bitcoin. Since it's not going that low ($25,000) for the past few weeks you may want to consider that it may not. Buy now or be left and have regrets, besides, it is still going up no matter what. But that's another case and my own opinion. Good luck building your own portfolio, it's difficult to find new and good projects this days.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: I think there's a good chance Bitcoin will be at $25k in the coming weeks due to the ongoing bear market cycle, so to build a portfolio it's a good idea to start now as the price is on its low.Because this is a long term I will not think about less popular altcoins unless they have a large market capitalist, with a long journey of course it will be full of twists and turns that will be faced later on, the potential for large coins to be included in your portfolio, especially bitcoin with a slightly larger allocation.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Now is a good time to buy. Look at the new projects that were released in 2021 and gathered a large community, they are 90-98% cheaper than their ATH. What's not a reason to buy, good prices, sometimes even lower than ICO\IDO prices. If it drops even lower, that's okay, buy some more. Just do not try to find the absolute bottom and buy everything with one order, it will not work, unless by lucky chance. But investing is not a lottery, everything should be approached systematically and with as little risk as possible.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: I'm doing with a simple research.From "Bitcoin History Bullish & Bearish" according to price history each time bitcoin reach all-time high the bearish will come around 75-85% down from ATH price. If we following that history, I'm going to entering crypto or bitcoin at the time bitcoin price reached 12,000-15,000$.Then, will hold until next halving (Good scenario 20x from the all-time low) so bitcoin reached around more than 250,000$.

comments.author: MArsland
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on June 07, 2022, 01:00:41 PMWhen is a good time to start buying altcoins? Is bitcoin ever going to 25,000$ in the coming weeks? How do you plan to start building your portfolio for the next bull market? Is now a good time to start buying?.The right time to buy is when you are ready with all the buying decisions themselves. No one knows for sure if the bulls are done and facing bear season or indeed we are being prepared for more significant changes. We're already in and not starting over. If in this session Bitcoin has been under $25K then anyone will take big profits in the future.

comments.author: hyudien
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on June 07, 2022, 03:45:29 PMI think we are not at the bottom of a bear market, I would wait a little longer with a new entry into the majority of altcoins. they have weaker resistance than Bitcoin and I believe they will go even lower. Should also be very careful (based on experience from the previous bear) many very promising altcoins have never recovered.This is what I was worried about, so as you said waiting longer was a choice I also made. Don't want to rush into positioning just because the drop doesn't look too deep. If we contemplate a long bearish market, it is certain that altcoins to return past their highs will not be easy, maybe not even recover.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on June 07, 2022, 01:00:41 PM~When? Right now as long as you're looking for top altcoins in the market. It is a bearish market right now and everyone should take the opportunity of the low price.25k? No one knows, but I have doubts on that. It seems to recover quite a bit to 30k as of writing this.For the plan, I am all for Bitcoin right now and earn from the returns.

comments.author: erep
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on June 07, 2022, 07:00:55 PMI'm doing with a simple research.From "Bitcoin History Bullish & Bearish" according to price history each time bitcoin reach all-time high the bearish will come around 75-85% down from ATH price. If we following that history, I'm going to entering crypto or bitcoin at the time bitcoin price reached 12,000-15,000$.Then, will hold until next halving (Good scenario 20x from the all-time low) so bitcoin reached around more than 250,000$.Maybe the 75-85% decline pattern from the historical lows of ATH can be used as a reference for a new portfolio sheet in long-term investment, but waiting for the lowest decline is not guaranteed to be achieved at prices lower than 75% of ATH, note from recent historical low of only 25k and stable the recovery area is vulnerable to 29-30k, so it's difficult to break below 20k and may have to wait patiently for the next bear market.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on June 07, 2022, 01:00:41 PMWhen is a good time to start buying altcoins? When it has dumped.Quote from: CryptoATM on June 07, 2022, 01:00:41 PMIs bitcoin ever going to 25,000$ in the coming weeks? No one will tell you that accurately but only predictions will say it.Quote from: CryptoATM on June 07, 2022, 01:00:41 PMHow do you plan to start building your portfolio for the next bull market? It has already been built and it lies around with bitcoin and ethereum.Quote from: CryptoATM on June 07, 2022, 01:00:41 PMIs now a good time to start buying?.Yeah, still. If you have plans of holding it for a long time, you can still hold and buy right now. Well, it's business as usual as long as you haven't met your target price.

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: Today was a good opportunity to earn some money for those who carefully watched the bnb news .20 dollars could be added to the balance without any problems.Now there is such a market that you should not wait for big events, you need to be ready for short distances.it is very difficult to talk about future plans today, everything changes every day.Earn today, don't wait another 3 years.

comments.author: trendcoin
comments.body: Waiting until 2025 is too long. I won't wait until that date. I'm already an impatient person and also I don't think the new bull season will last until 2025. Maybe we can experience a short and fast bull season. EOS (5%), SOL (10%), BNB (15%), Ethereum (20%), Bitcoin (35%), USD (15%). I will create a portfolio like this approximately, because I need to build a solid portfolio. And If a short bull season doesn't start, the major coins I trust won't worry me too much. Because I can hold them for long periods of time.

comments.author: CaVO32
comments.body: Quote from: trendcoin on June 07, 2022, 09:16:21 PMWaiting until 2025 is too long. I won't wait until that date. I'm already an impatient person and also I don't think the new bull season will last until 2025. Maybe we can experience a short and fast bull season. EOS (5%), SOL (10%), BNB (15%), Ethereum (20%), Bitcoin (35%), USD (15%). I will create a portfolio like this approximately, because I need to build a solid portfolio. And If a short bull season doesn't start, the major coins I trust won't worry me too much. Because I can hold them for long periods of time.That is right, 2025 is too long when it comes to crypto market. If I will wait that long, maybe, I only have confidence to store my coins in BTC only. Even top alts, you need to be cautious as they can easily exit the market if the team behind it decide to cash out their share. By the way, in your list, you have EOS, do you really think EOS has better future? It seemed they have been surpassed by new networks like MATIC, SOL or BSC.

comments.author: lalabotax
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoATM on June 07, 2022, 01:00:41 PMWhen is a good time to start buying altcoins? Is bitcoin ever going to 25,000$ in the coming weeks? How do you plan to start building your portfolio for the next bull market? Is now a good time to start buying?.You can start to analyze what altcoins to buy besides buying more BTC. But 'when is the best time to buy?' I am not really sure to answer it. However, in my opinion, buying now seems too early. We need to wait for BTC to drop below $25k to start buying BTC and some altcoins. For altcoins, I plan to buy top altcoins only such as BNB, ETH, ADA, SOL, DOT, AVAX, MATIC, LINK, HBAR, SAND, XLM, or TRX.

comments.author: bitkanu
comments.body: no one is gonna know the right time for making accumulation honestly, after all the bottom of bearish market could be very random and the start of another trend are also gonna be suddenly coming up.regardless current time is the right time for making an entry in your investment and also making an accumulation, most of the altcoins are already down more than 50% in value,I think that kind of massive discount is enough if you gonna make an entry with your investment and making a long term holding.
